item.title: Exec Flex: The 8 Boldest New Power Watches for Hollywood Players
item.description: The latest statement pieces to catch the eye (and stoke the envy) of your fellow machers from across the room.

item.title: How Sports Stars Became the New Supermodels
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz in Louis Vuitton, Coco Gauff in Miu Miu, Jannik Sinner in Gucci: Forget actors, fashion brands are falling over themselves to attract A-list athletic ambassadors.

item.title: Get a Behind-the-Scenes Look at Seventeen’s Mingyu in New Calvin Klein Campaign (Exclusive Video)
item.description: The 28-year-old K-pop star has frequently collaborated with the brand in the past, including the Fall 2024 denim campaign.

item.title: Ralph Lauren’s Beloved Mascot Pulls Off Art Heist in Fashion Brand’s First Animated Film
item.description: A teaser for ’The Polo Bear Chronicles: Operation Black Tie’ dropped Monday, with the full animated short film scheduled to debut Thursday.

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: Brooke Shields’ Jeans Ad Did Not Sit Well
item.description: In 1980, the 15-year-old actress starred in print and TV ads for Calvin Klein that sparked a furor similar to Sydney Sweeney’s recent American Eagle campaign.

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: Brooke Shields’ Jeans Ad Did Not Sit Well
item.description: In 1980, the 15-year-old actress starred in print and TV ads for Calvin Klein that sparked a furor similar to Sydney Sweeney’s recent American Eagle campaign.

item.title: American Eagle Responds to Sydney Sweeney Jeans Campaign Amid Controversy
item.description: The popular retailer issued a statement on Instagram on Friday: “Sydney Sweeney Has Great Jeans is and always was about the jeans.”

item.title: Binge the Show. Buy the Look! From ‘White Lotus’ to ‘Emily in Paris’ (Almost) Everything Is for Sale
item.description: TV’s richest characters are miserable narcissists. Now, thanks to a slew of screen-inspired fashion collaborations, you can dress just like them.
